components.name: CLI Interface
components.description: The command-line interface allows users to interact with the Taskmaster system, issuing commands to manage tasks and retrieve information.

components.name: Task Management Service
components.description: The backend service responsible for processing tasks, managing state, and interfacing with AI models for task generation and updates.

components.name: AI Integration Layer
components.description: This component handles communication with various AI providers, allowing the system to utilize different AI models for task management.

data_flows.description: User commands are sent from the CLI to the Task Management Service for processing.
The Task Management Service requests task generation or updates from the AI Integration Layer.
The AI Integration Layer returns generated tasks or updates back to the Task Management Service.

trust_boundaries.name: User Input Boundary
trust_boundaries.description: The boundary between user input through the CLI and the backend processing components.

trust_boundaries.name: AI Provider Boundary
trust_boundaries.description: The boundary between the Task Management Service and external AI providers, ensuring secure communication.
